title: Chat stuck on top of the game
body: Hello everybody, recently my chat got stuck on the right top corner of the game and i cant move it . It's really annyoing to not being able to see what your teammates are saying. Any help ? {{summoner:32}}

replies.body: I got the same problem, but I am not able to hit the blue bar :( I have been trying to make the chat bigger and smaller, and see if that helped dragging down the chat, but it didn't.
Im not able to reach it i will take a screenshot

That sounds like quite the pickle you're in at the moment! No worries, we'll sort this right out. 

You may be able to hit **ENTER** on your keyboard to bring up the chat bot, which will reveal the blue bar above chat. If you can grab the end of that blue bar with a left mouse click, you should be able to move the box to where you want it. Below is a screenshot of what I'm talking about.

(Click to enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/VFtyv

Let me know if this helped out.
